name: Slime Slayer (itch) (MangoTheKing)
description:
Walk through the many (singular) hallways, slaying the beautifully (horribly) coded AIs, and kill the various (only one type of) slimes. There is no end, there is no winning, only the endless rush of time awaits those who play. 

SPACE BAR IS ATTACK - NO SWING ANIMATION YET
